header.title: Join Our Global Movement
header.description: Discover opportunities to contribute your talents, develop new skills, and make an impact on the world stage.

opportunities.title: Opportunities for Engagement
opportunities.subtitle: Whether you're a student, young professional, or established expert, there are multiple ways to get involved

items.title: Youth Delegate Program
items.description: Join our flagship program for young leaders aged 18-30. Participate in international conferences, diplomatic simulations, and policy development processes.

items.title: Volunteer Opportunities
items.description: Contribute your skills to support our programs and operations. Volunteers play crucial roles in event organization, communications, research, and more.

items.title: Mentorship Program
items.description: Share your expertise with the next generation of diplomatic leaders. Our mentors guide youth participants through their professional development journey.

mentorForm.title: Become a Mentor
mentorForm.subtitle: Share your expertise with emerging diplomatic leaders. Fill out the form below and our team will reach out to discuss mentorship opportunities.

header.title: Connect With Us
header.description: Reach out to collaborate, ask questions, or learn more about our initiatives. We're here to engage with you.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions about our programs? Interested in partnership opportunities? Want to explore collaboration? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.address:

social.title: Connect on Social Media
social.subtitle: Join our global community and stay updated with the latest news and events

networks.name: Instagram
networks.description: Follow us for behind-the-scenes moments, event highlights, and youth stories.

networks.name: LinkedIn
networks.description: Connect professionally and explore career opportunities in global affairs.

networks.name: X (Twitter)
networks.description: Join conversations on global issues and stay updated with real-time news.

networks.name: Facebook
networks.description: Join our community for updates, discussions, and event announcements.
